mapper.select: SELECT emp_no FROM ( SELECT emp_no, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY dept_code ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(emp_no, -2)) DESC) as rnk FROM employee WHERE dept_code = #{dept_code} ) WHERE rnk = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee ( emp_no, pw, name, dept_code, role_code, join_date, nickname, ssn, phone, email, zip_code, address, detail_address ) VALUES ( #{emp_no}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{dept_code}, #{role_code}, SYSDATE, ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM employee WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND pw = #{pw}

SELECT e.emp_no, e.pw, e.name, e.nickname, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(e.ssn, 8, 1) IN ('1', '2') THEN '19' || SUBSTR(e.ssn, 1, 2) || '년' || SUBSTR(e.ssn, 3, 2) || '월' || SUBSTR(e.ssn, 5, 2) || '일' WHEN SUBSTR(e.ssn, 8, 1) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR(e.ssn, 1, 2) || '년' || SUBSTR(e.ssn, 3, 2) || '월' || SUBSTR(e.ssn, 5, 2) || '일' ELSE NULL END AS ssn, e.phone, e.email, e.zip_code, e.address, e.detail_address, d.dept_title AS dept_code, r.role_title AS role_code, e.join_date, e.quit_date, e.quit_yn FROM employee e JOIN dept d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code JOIN role r ON e.role_code = r.role_code WHERE e.emp_no = #{emp_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET nickname = #{nickname}, ssn = #{ssn}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, zip_code = #{zip_code}, address = #{address}, detail_address = #{detail_address}, pw = #{pw} WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no}
mapper.select: SELECT emp_no FROM employee WHERE name = #{name} AND ssn = #{ssn}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee WHERE nickname = #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET pw = #{newPassword} WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no}
